data.enText: a long angry speech criticizing sb/sth or accusing sb of sth
data.chText: （批评或指责性的）长篇激烈讲话

data.enText: She launched into a tirade of abuse against politicians.
data.chText: 她发表了长篇演说，愤怒地谴责政客。

means: (批评或指责性的)长篇激烈讲话

example.ex: She launched into a tirade against the policies that ruined her business...
example.tran: 她就造成自己企业破产的政策发表了激愤的长篇演说。

example.ex: He too has met a tirade of abuse.
example.tran: 他也遭到了长篇累牍的谩骂攻击。

value.def: A tirade is a long angry speech in which someone criticizes a person or thing.
value.tran: 激愤的长篇演说;长篇的批评性发言
